plot: John Oliver talks about the flawed way children learn about the history of race in USA. He points out the three major points needed to address about the white supremacy and racial injustice throughout the history. He emphasized that teaching them complete history rather than the misleading information is good way to move forward to the path of prosperity. Without that reform, the gap between minorities and whites will continue to extend, as well as the misconception of white supremacy will prevail in the society.—Niaz Islam Arif
